attributes.action: pardon helen duncan, the last witch to be tried in britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see helen duncan, the last woman to be tried as a witch in the u.k. being pardoned, as this is the 50th aniversary of her death

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "pardon helen duncan, the last witch to be tried in britain."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11730.asp

Prime Minister's Office
